primaryTopic.definition: On the 1st of January 2009, this department was combined with the Department of Consumer and Employment Protection, which were then split into three new departments, the Department of Mines and Petroleum, the Department of State Development and the Department of Commerce. (Courtesy of Wikipedia)
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: Department of Mines and Petroleum (DMP), Western Australian Government
